trans-unit.source: A product that change the standard Plone behavior of the "Display" menu
trans-unit.target: 表示」メニューのPloneの標準動作を変更する製品

trans-unit.source: Add “Products.ATCustomizableView” to the egg section of your buildout configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Add “Products.ATCustomizableView” to the egg section of your buildout configuration file.

trans-unit.source: Added a way for changing layout and template [keul]
trans-unit.target: レイアウトやテンプレートの変更方法を追加 [keul]

trans-unit.source: Added a way to handle view menu for default page in the folder [keul]
trans-unit.target: フォルダ[keul]にデフォルトページのビューメニューを扱う方法を追加しました。

trans-unit.source: Added an uninstall profile [keul]
trans-unit.target: アンインストールプロファイル[keul]を追加しました。

trans-unit.source: Added controls on selectable views. [keul]
trans-unit.target: 選択可能なビューにコントロールを追加しました。[keul]

trans-unit.source: Added doc guide fo user that wanna to keep the ATCustomizable features only for ZMI [keul]
trans-unit.target: ZMI専用のATカスタマイズ機能を維持したいユーザーのためのドキュメントガイドを追加しました。

trans-unit.source: Added friendly Plone UI for managing configurations [keul]
trans-unit.target: 設定を管理するためのフレンドリーなPlone UIを追加しました。

trans-unit.source: After that you can continue working only using ZMI properties tab!
trans-unit.target: その後はZMIプロパティタブのみで作業を続けることができます

trans-unit.source: Bad bug: the product was checking a wrong permission name [keul]
trans-unit.target: 不正なパーミッション名をチェックしていた不具合 [keul]

trans-unit.source: Bad identation; menu will raise error if the product is not installed [keul]
trans-unit.target: 製品がインストールされていないとメニューでエラーが発生します。

trans-unit.source: Behaviour described above can be reach also developing additional content types. However I found not very useful developing silly content type or marker interfaces only for obtaining additional layout.
trans-unit.target: 上記のような動作は、追加のコンテンツタイプを開発することでも実現可能です。しかし、私は、付加的なレイアウトを得るためだけに、くだらないコンテンツタイプやマーカーインターフェースを開発することは、あまり役に立たないと感じました。

trans-unit.source: Changes
trans-unit.target: 変更点

trans-unit.source: Customize menu view was not callable on non-folderish contents [keul]
trans-unit.target: フォルダ化されていないコンテンツでメニュー表示のカスタマイズが呼び出せない問題を修正した。

trans-unit.source: Do not apply patches if the product is not installed [keul]
trans-unit.target: 製品がインストールされていない場合はパッチを適用しないでください。

trans-unit.source: Egg cleanup [keul]
trans-unit.target: 卵のお掃除[キール]

trans-unit.source: Fixed dependency in the product [keul]
trans-unit.target: 製品[keul]の依存関係を修正しました。

trans-unit.source: For Plone versions 3.2 or lower, remember the zcml section:
trans-unit.target: Ploneのバージョン3.2以下の場合は、zcmlセクションを覚えておいてください。

trans-unit.source: For every specific content of the portal:
trans-unit.target: ポータルの特定のコンテンツごとに

trans-unit.source: For example: you have developed a new view for the Page and you want optionally leave to your authors to use or not this view in the home-page sub-sections of your site.
trans-unit.target: For example: you have developed a new view for the Page and you want optionally leave to your authors to use or not this view in the home-page sub-sections of your site.

trans-unit.source: Forget Plone 2.5 support.
trans-unit.target: Plone 2.5のサポートを忘れてください。

trans-unit.source: Found a missing import of IBrowserMenu (I know… I need tests) [keul]
trans-unit.target: Found a missing import of IBrowserMenu (I know… I need tests) [keul]

trans-unit.source: I got some (good) criticism about releases of ATCustomizableView that started to display Plone UI, even if those changes were in the TODO for a long time.
trans-unit.target: Plone UIを表示し始めたATCustomizableViewのリリースについて、それらの変更が長い間TODOにあったとしても、私はいくつかの(良い)批判を受けました。

trans-unit.source: If you don’t want any UI
trans-unit.target: If you don’t want any UI

trans-unit.source: If you liked older versions, where you were forced to go to ZMI, simply remove to all user roles the Customize menu: view permission. Also to Manager.
trans-unit.target: If you liked older versions, where you were forced to go to ZMI, simply remove to all user roles the Customize menu: view permission. Also to Manager.

trans-unit.source: Initial releases
trans-unit.target: 初回リリース

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: インストール

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 序章

trans-unit.source: Is this working with Dexterity based content types? If not: can I make this works someway?
trans-unit.target: これはDexterityベースのコンテンツタイプで動作しますか?そうでない場合:どうにかしてこれを動作させることはできますか?

trans-unit.source: Keep in mind that you are adding new views to a single content of your site.
trans-unit.target: あなたのサイトの単一のコンテンツに新しいビューを追加していることを念頭に置いてください。

trans-unit.source: Like above, registering this view for the Page content types will leave to authors the choice to use this view for all page of the site but, for design choice, you want to use this view only for some specific pages.
trans-unit.target: Like above, registering this view for the Page content types will leave to authors the choice to use this view for all page of the site but, for design choice, you want to use this view only for some specific pages.

trans-unit.source: No more ugly-old-style monkey patch, but now collective.monkeypatcher is required. [keul]
trans-unit.target: No more ugly-old-style monkey patch, but now collective.monkeypatcher is required. [keul]

trans-unit.source: No much to say, may be you don’t want to inherit the content types views and don’t want that your authors are able to use them.
trans-unit.target: No much to say, may be you don’t want to inherit the content types views and don’t want that your authors are able to use them.

trans-unit.source: Plone 4.3 compatibility [keul]
trans-unit.target: Plone 4.3の互換性 [keul]

trans-unit.source: Product is now installable [keul]
trans-unit.target: 製品がインストール可能になりました [keul]

trans-unit.source: Registering this view for all Folder content types will give to your author the choice to use this view also in other section of the site, but you don’t want it. A views pollution in the “Display” menu can be confusing.
trans-unit.target: Registering this view for all Folder content types will give to your author the choice to use this view also in other section of the site, but you don’t want it. A views pollution in the “Display” menu can be confusing.

trans-unit.source: Removed a reference to unknow method “getSavedCustomizations”. This remove a warning on Zope start-up [keul]
trans-unit.target: Removed a reference to unknow method “getSavedCustomizations”. This remove a warning on Zope start-up [keul]

trans-unit.source: Simplification for developers
trans-unit.target: 開発者のための簡素化

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you need to apply a new view to a single content, like a folder. For example: you have a folder where you know is used only for News Item contents and you have a quite good view for this folder.
trans-unit.target: Sometimes you need to apply a new view to a single content, like a folder. For example: you have a folder where you know is used only for News Item contents and you have a quite good view for this folder.

trans-unit.source: TODO
trans-unit.target: TODO

trans-unit.source: Tested also on Plone 4 [keul]
trans-unit.target: Plone 4 [keul]でもテストしました。

trans-unit.source: Tests…
trans-unit.target: Tests…

trans-unit.source: This product can change the behaviour of the Plone’s “Display” menu, making it a little customizable. Those customization are not content type related, but are done for a single content.
trans-unit.target: This product can change the behaviour of the Plone’s “Display” menu, making it a little customizable. Those customization are not content type related, but are done for a single content.

trans-unit.source: Translations (for now in Italian, other are welcome) [keul]
trans-unit.target: 翻訳(今のところイタリア語ですが、他の言語も歓迎します)[keul

trans-unit.source: User cases
trans-unit.target: ユーザー事例

trans-unit.source: Why adding new entry in the menu
trans-unit.target: メニューに新しいエントリを追加する理由

trans-unit.source: Why dropping base views
trans-unit.target: ベースビューを落とす理由

trans-unit.source: Why freeze the content layout?
trans-unit.target: なぜコンテンツのレイアウトを凍結するのか?

trans-unit.source: You can add custom, additional, views to a content.
trans-unit.target: コンテンツにカスタム、追加、ビューを追加することができます。

trans-unit.source: You can block ability of your authors to change content’s layouts.
trans-unit.target: You can block ability of your authors to change content’s layouts.

trans-unit.source: You can hide all standard available layout for a content, leaving only the new customized ones.
trans-unit.target: コンテンツの標準的なレイアウトをすべて非表示にすることができ、新しいカスタマイズされたレイアウトだけを残すことができます。
